name: Create a Resource Guru resource (person) from a Google Sheets row
description:
Use this template to automatically create a Resource Guru resource (person) from a new Google Sheets spreadsheet row.

Your spreadsheet has to include this information:  Timezone (use the Name of the timezone from this [list](https://resourceguruapp.com/docs/api#section/Data-types/Timezones)), First name, Last name, Phone, Email.
